DOUBLE_TIME.name: Double Time
DOUBLE_TIME.description: Double the duration of Tactical Sprint, increase crouch movement speed by 30%

BOMB_SQUAD.name: Bomb Squad
BOMB_SQUAD.description: Take reduced damage from non-Killstreak explosives. Reset fuse timers when picking up live grenades

TRACKER.name: Tracker
TRACKER.description: Enemies leave behind a footprint trail and enemy death markers are visible. Eliminations are hidden from the enemy team

SCAVENGER.name: Scavenger
SCAVENGER.description: Resupply ammo and an extra plate from dead players

STRONG_ARM.name: Strong Arm
STRONG_ARM.description: Throw equipment father, and see a preview of the trajectory

BATTLE_HARDENED.name: Battle Hardened
BATTLE_HARDENED.description: Reduce the effect of enemy Flash, Stun, EMP, Gas Grenades, and Shock Sticks. Immune to Snapshot grenades
